similarities: Both are leave and license agreements
Both documents have a maintenance fee in addition to the rent
Both agreements have a duration of 11 months
differences: Document 1 is registered in Pune and Document 2 in Mumbai
Document 1 is between Rajesh Sharma and Priya Nair, while Document 2 is between Ashok Gupta and Rahul Desai
The property in Document 1 is a flat in Rose Residency, Baner, Pune, and the property in Document 2 is a flat in Ocean Heights, Andheri West, Mumbai
The monthly rent in Document 1 is ₹25,000 and in Document 2 is ₹60,000
unique_doc1: The owner of the property in Document 1 is Rajesh Sharma, s/o late Mohan Sharma
The licensee of the property in Document 1 is Priya Nair, d/o Anil Nair, from Kochi, Kerala
unique_doc2: The owner of the property in Document 2 is Ashok Gupta, s/o Shyam Gupta
The licensee of the property in Document 2 is Rahul Desai, s/o Mahesh Desai, from Surat, Gujarat
The registration date of Document 2 is 10/01/2025
